summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City employment commonly referred to as the Third Quarter 2008 Employment Ordinance; establishing new titles and/or salaries; establishing a new salary for a non-represented title in the same class series as a represented title; designating positions as exempt from Civil Service status; and establishing a compensation program by adding a new section to Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 4.20; all by a 2/3 vote of the City Council.
committee: Culture, Civil Rights, Health and Personnel
